mapper.select: select men_id, men_name, men_up_no, men_disp_no, men_ord, men_url from tbl_subway_menu

select a.pro_id, a.pro_name_kor, a.pro_name_eng, a.pro_contents, a.pro_cate_id, a.pro_image_id, a.pro_ingredient_id, a.pro_price_status, b.img_id, b.img_file_up_path, c.cat_id, c.cat_nm, c.cat_up_cd, c.cat_use_yn from tbl_subway_product a, tbl_subway_image b, tbl_subway_category c where a.pro_cate_id in( 'B100', 'B101', 'B102', 'B400', 'B401' ) and a.pro_image_id = b.img_id and a.pro_cate_id = c.cat_id

select nno_id, nno_title, nno_contents, nno_reg_date, nno_news_yn, nno_use_yn, nno_image_use_yn, nno_image_id, nno_image_grp_use_yn, nno_image_grp_id from tbl_subway_newsnoti order by nno_reg_date desc limit 0, 3
